column5: Welcome! #2 - Villa #2one bedroom/one bath villa - all bills paid, furnished, perfect place for one or two people, queen size bed, large couch, small fridge, microwave, hot plate, toaster oven, huge tile shower, free WiFi, and Direct TV. As host who own and live on the property, we try to be welcoming and responsive. We will also respect your privacy and never intrude, either your space or your time. Enjoy the unique 3-Plex Villas.
